thread.title: South MS military community eyeing next round of BRAC
thread.title_full: South MS military community eyeing next round of BRAC

author: Frank Corder
title: South MS military community eyeing next round of BRAC
text: Gulf coast leaders on high alert for base closure commission BILOXI, Miss. (AP) - A new round of military base closings has been recommended for 2017. The Sun Herald reports ( http://bit.ly/1MGSCP6 ) an upcoming evaluation of all U.S. military bases has members of South Mississippi's military and business communities gearing up to prove its installations are valuable and necessary... ...Between five installations -- Keesler Air Force Base in Biloxi, Naval Construction Battalion Center in Gulfport, Trent Lott Training Complex in Gulfport, Stennis Space Center in Hancock County and Camp Shelby in Hattiesburg -- the military employs 19,760 people in southern Mississippi. WLBT Posted October 23, 2015 - 5:32 am YallPolitics.Com now uses Facebook for comments. Log into Facebook to comment here.
